heading: mr. potatoe mashed
subheading: dan quayle is dropping out of the republican presidential race, according to a quayle campaign worker who says the former vice president can't raise enough money to mount a serious challenge to george w. bush. with 9 percent of the vote, quayle is a distant second to bush. it's not clear whether the texas governor is a better speller than quayle. but bush has already raised us$50 million dollars, and that's five times as much as any other gop candidate.
author: wired staff
text: dan quayle is dropping out of the republican presidential race, according to a quayle campaign worker who says the former vice president can't raise enough money to mount a serious challenge to george w. bush. with 9 percent of the vote, quayle is a distant second to bush. it's not clear whether the texas governor is a better speller than quayle. but bush has already raised us$50 million dollars, and that's five times as much as any other gop candidate.
